results.title: MONO, Tallinn, December 1, 2025, 19:00, Tickets ‚Äì www.livenation.ee
results.content: MONO will perform in Tallinn on December 1, 2025, at Paavli Kultuurivabrik, doors open at 7:00 PM. Tickets are available online and at Piletilevi.
results.raw_content:
![Site logo - www.livenation.ee - go to homepage](https://networksites.livenationinternational.com/networksites/lbxlwtw5/ln-logo-primary-red-40px.svg)

Sign In/Register

![MONO](https://dynamicmedia.livenationinternational.com/k/q/j/683d5ef4-404b-457b-a285-6ae36a15a5b5.jpg?format=webp&width=1920&quality=75)

# MONO

# Mon, 01 Dec 2025

[Paavli Kultuurivabrik,](/en/paavli-kultuurivabrik-tickets-vdp1421164) Tallinn

Doors: 7:00 PM

## Tickets

## General Onsale

## Info

On December 1, 2025, the legendary Japanese instrumental rock band MONO will bring their breathtaking soundscapes to Paavli Kultuurivabrik in Tallinn. Known for their seamless fusion of orchestral grandeur and shoegaze-infused guitar noise, MONO has captivated audiences worldwide for over 25 years, earning them a reputation as one of the most compelling live acts in modern music. Special guest Bedless Bones.

Tickets are available via Piletilevi sales points and online.

Follow the event on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/events/989400039819875)!

Entry from the age of 7. We strongly recommend visitors under the age of 10 to wear hearing protection headphones.

**All ticket games, including on social media channels, are strictly prohibited without the written consent of the concert organizer!**

# [MONO](/artists/201140-mono)

![ilia-33‚Äôs profile image](//images.sk-static.com/images/media/profile_images/users/172851198/medium_avatar "ilia-33")
![robiW‚Äôs profile image](//images.sk-static.com/images/media/profile_images/users/184975138/medium_avatar "robiW")
![saber-kordestanchi‚Äôs profile image](//images.sk-static.com/images/media/profile_images/users/134732234/medium_avatar "saber-kordestanchi")
![MONO](//assets.sk-static.com/images/default_images/large_avatar/default-artist.png)

## Line-up

![MONO Concert Tickets - 2025 Tour Dates.]()
![Chevron right icon]()

## Venue

## Related upcoming events

![Marcos Valle Concert Tickets - 2025 Tour Dates](//images.sk-static.com/images/media/profile_images/artists/5852/medium_avatar)

## Live reviews

MONO - not to be confused with the Irish rock band, who don‚Äôt stylise their name in all capitals like this particular outfit - are one of the most important post-rock bands in Japanese history; over the course of a colourful fifteen year career to date, they‚Äôve released six studio albums, each of which has played with the boundaries of their genre in its own unique way. Their most recent record, For My Parents, met with some of the strongest reviews of the group‚Äôs career, and confirmed them as one of the few instrumental rock bands that have genuinely evolved with each release to date; they might hail from Tokyo, but they‚Äôre very much in thrall to Western shoegaze and ambient bands. Their live shows, too, have been a major part in reinforcing their formidable reputation; they‚Äôre incredibly atmospheric affairs that use the volume dial like a weapon, capable of swinging from one sonic extreme to the other in the blink of an eye. Later this month, they‚Äôll make their UK return at the ArcTangent festival in Bristol, after a two year absence; expect a genuinely incendiary affair, with a moody light show, impressively technical guitar work and atmosphere by the truckload all present and correct.

![Joeg_67‚Äôs profile image](//images.sk-static.com/images/media/profile_images/users/10085298/medium_avatar)
